testsuite.name: 5 - With permission, I can use links on the home page

failure.message:
cy.request() failed on:
https://thy.test.l7informatics.com/login
The response we received from your web server was:
> 401: Unauthorized
This was considered a failure because the status code was not '2xx' or '3xx'.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: 'failOnStatusCode: false'

Method: POST URL: https://thy.test.l7informatics.com/login Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "Content-Type": "application/json", "Authorization": "Basic YWxpY2VAZXhhbXBsZS5jb206TDRiN1IwY2tzIQ==", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/83.0.4103.116 Safari/537.36", "accept": "application/json", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-length": 0 }
-----------------------------------------------------------
